Reviews.Title: “good location, average rooms”
Reviews.Author: Row1981
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights recently hotel postion exploring rome hundred metres trevi fountain spanish steps close metro handy arrive termini main train station adequate bed bathroom clean fine base city break breakfast passable tinned fruit cheese meats pastries orange juice machine poor staff helpful moved following day base cool feet hard days sightseeing dont expect else

Reviews.Content: starters apparently rented prebooked confirmed prepaid five nights proposed walk 500m corner luggage lesser hotel quality line 3 stars service hospitality senior staff absolutely apologized offered compensation arrival mishap worst hotels stayed location center rome extremely convenient visiting city

Reviews.Title: “great location , opposite site of audrey hepurn ' residence”

Reviews.Content: wife stayed 3nights getting cruise couldnt happier accomodations deluxe suite staff wonderful friendly advance reservations museums restaurants location front barberini palace movie roman holidays audrey stayed perfect highly recommend hotel clean friendly

Reviews.Title: “Bad air conditioner; HOT; noisy; small; No customer service”

Reviews.Content: switch hotel bad prepaid couldnt refund guess live learn bottom floor 2 bedroom suite 2 suitcase fit loft suite hotel supposedly booked fighting bald receptionist guy kept saying ac fine finally technician twice fix air conditioner 2nd technician ac automatically 12am midnight hotel wont till day didnt windows hear noises outside kids sweat night loft guy reception desk bald rude traveled europe oh breakfast ok location nice lots hotels

Reviews.Content: central location fine bedroom dark furnishings fittings didnt help central rome hotels compare bathroom bright clean stocked dont agree noisy staff forthcoming despite trying pleasantries conversation barely 2 words electricity 24 hours tea lights didnt help situation left lit saucers floor corridors stairs pitch black explanation apology breakfast apparently gone pastries left reception residents help themselves fault power gone knock door food delivered bed night sightseeing fine youre looking special im

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great stay”
Reviews.Author: gaylordm
Reviews.Content: arrived late hotel reservation ready helpful check information midnight walked 8 minutes trevi fountain sized bathroom loved breakfast stay overlooking street car noise irritating easy walk subway piazza navone trevi fountain definitely recommend hotel stay time rome

Reviews.Title: “Horrible, Small, Dinghy - However, good location!!!!”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel celebrate 50th excited time change flew easyjet flight transfer airport hotel disapointing leave straight arrived 1230 told ready 2pm decided leave reception discover rome return key straight wait hotel advised impending celebrations horror dark dinghy noisy due heavy traffic constant barking neighbouring dog thinking staying seriously recommend taking ear plugs stress hotel hill breakfast staff little enthusiastic towards guests overall hotel looked tired dirty avoided costs ruined special birthday hotel position
